/usr/bin/c++ -rdynamic CMakeFiles/2_CamerasAndShadows.dir/BasicTutorial2.cpp.o -o 2_CamerasAndShadows  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libOgreBites.so.1.12.11 /usr/local/lib/libOgreMeshLodGenerator.so.1.12.11 /usr/local/lib/libOgreOverlay.so.1.12.11 /usr/local/lib/libOgreProperty.so.1.12.11 /usr/local/lib/libOgreRTShaderSystem.so.1.12.11 /usr/local/lib/libOgreTerrain.so.1.12.11 /usr/local/lib/libOgreVolume.so.1.12.11 /usr/local/lib/libOgrePaging.so.1.12.11 /usr/local/lib/libOgreMain.so.1.12.11 -lpthread
